price_font.comment: Enable google font to use this option

price_color.label: Price Color:
price_color.comment: This color will be used for price

price_circle.label: Show Price circle on product listing

fixed_header.label: Enable fixed header
fixed_header.comment: If enabled - header will always stay at the top

search_field.label: Show search field instead of icon in header

override_css.label: Enable custom css
override_css.comment: Enable this option to load "override.css" file in which you can override the default styling of the theme. To create "override.css" you can use the file "default.override.css" which is located in skin/frontend/shopper/default/css directory.

hide_compare.label: Hide Compare functionality
hide_compare.comment: It will hide compare links across the site, compare sideblock and compare icon in header.

prev_next.label: Disable prev_next buttons
prev_next.comment: Prev / Next buttons on product page

use_wide_navigation.label: Enable Wide Navigation
use_wide_navigation.comment: DO NOT ENABLE wide navigation and "Shopper Theme Navigation" option at a time

use_navigation.label: Use Shopper Theme Navigation
use_navigation.comment: Select NO to use default magento navigation

column_items.label: Number of items in column
column_items.comment: Define number of items in column for subcategories dropdown

custom_block_width.label: Custom Navigation Block width
custom_block_width.comment: Define custom block width in px

categories_filter.label: Show Categories filter in layered navigation:

shopby_num.label: Limit number of shown attribute options in layered navigation sideblock:
shopby_num.comment: Will hide more than that number and add 'more' link

grid_columns_2col.label: Number of columns in grid mode ( 2 columns layout ) :
grid_columns_2col.comment:
To change number of products per page go to
System -> Configuration -> Catalog -> Frontend

grid_columns_1col.label: Number of columns in grid mode ( 1 column layout ) :

bestsellers.label: Bestsellers
bestsellers.comment: Enter product ids you want to display in bestsellers block separated by comma. Example: 23,354,12. Leave empty to hide bestsellers

fax.label: Enable fax field
fax.comment: Fax field in billing / shipping form on checkout.

top_signup.label: Show Sign Up Link
top_signup.comment: Link in the Top Links (top right corner).

tweets_num.label: Number of tweets shown in the footer

twitter_replace.label: Replace Twitter with Static block
twitter_replace.comment: Enter cms block id if you want to replace twitter block with your static block

facebook_replace.label: Replace Facebook with Static block
facebook_replace.comment: Enter cms block id if you want to replace facebook block with your static block

big_image_height.label: Image Height After Zooming (px)
big_image_height.comment: Leave empty to keep aspect ratio of the image

tint_color.label: Tint Color
tint_color.comment: Color which will cover the main image. (e.g. #ededed). Does not work with Soft Focus.

soft_focus.label: Soft Focus
soft_focus.comment: Applies a subtle blur effect to the main image. Does not work with tint.

smooth_move.label: Smooth Move
smooth_move.comment: Amount of smoothness/drift of the zoom image as it moves. The higher the number, the smoother/more drifty the movement will be. 1 = no smoothing.

zoom.label: Zoom method for Product page
zoom.comment: If you use cloudZoom you still need to enable it in CloudZoom section

width.label: Main Product Image Width (px)
width.comment:
Please update cloudzoom big image size if you override dimensions.
If width is not specified, default width and height will be used (494 x 494 pixels).

height.label: Main Product Image Height (px)
height.comment: If height is not specified width value will be used. If width is not specified, default width and height will be used (494 x 494 pixels).

keep_ratio.label: Use aspect ratio for all images
keep_ratio.comment: Use main image aspect ration throughout the site

quick_view.label: Show Quick view button
quick_view.comment: Quick view popup will be shown for products with required options regardless of this option

quick_view_autoclose.label: Autoclose Quick view popup when product added to cart

number_upsell.label: Number of Upsell Products in slide

replace_upsell.label: Replace Upsell Products
replace_upsell.comment: Upsell products can be replaced with static block queldorei_product_additional

clone_price.label: Hide second price after product options on configurable product page

brands.label: Show All Brands
brands.comment: Yes - show all brands, No - brands which has at least one active product
